submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, arr, k):
        i = 0
        j = 1
        res=[]
        n = 0
        while j < len(arr) + k and i < len(arr):
            y = j
            res.append(j)
            a = y % len(arr)  
            while arr[a] != arr[a - 1] and (y < (len(arr) + k - 1)):
                y += 1
                res.append(y)
                a = y % len(arr)
            n += max(y - i - k + 1, 0)
            i = y
            res.append(j)
            j = i + 1
        return n
